Uses of Class
jparsec.astrophysics.gildas.SpectrumLine

  • Packages that use SpectrumLine 
    Package Description
    jparsec.astrophysics
    Classes to operate with measurements and spectra in astrophysics.
    jparsec.astrophysics.gildas
    Classes to manipulate Gildas files.

      Returns a perfect Gaussian spectrum given the parameters of the Gaussian.

      Reduces the spectrum in a fully automatic way.
      SpectrumLine Spectrum30m.toCorrectedVelocity(SpectrumLine line)
      Transforms the parameters of this line from Gildas velocity to corrected velocity (corrected for relativistic effects so that the width of the channel changes with frequency).
      SpectrumLine Spectrum30m.toGildasVelocity(SpectrumLine line)
      Transforms the parameters of this line from corrected velocity to Gildas velocity (not corrected for relativistic effects).
